column5: I know there's a few here that have fished this lake and/or stayed at Herridge Lake Lodge. I'm absolutely not looking for any fishing spots, just curious how you found the lake for fishing in general and what you caught.
Thanks Darren.  Anybody else with experience on this lake?

I've just booked a trip to this lake so I thought I'd revive this thread. I'm heading up there in late September. Staying at Papa John's Cottages (http://www.papajohnscottages.com).  Anyone ever fish this lake or stayed at Papa John's? Not looking for any fishing spots (our trip is guided), just looking for overall experience.
I will be looking forward to your report when you return  I hope it's a great trip
Better late than never! Here's my report: http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=51841  It was a great trip!!
